title: Bug 40884Eclipse crashes with Sun jdk 1.4.2
OB: When we switch from jdk 1.4.1 to 1.4.2, Eclipse crashes at startup.To make it at least start, I tried with a blank workspace but Eclipses keepscrashing as soon as I try to open a perspective, a project or the configurationdetails, anything heavier than opening a menu.Eclipse 2.1.1 (Build id: 200306271545), Win2000 SP3, Sun JDK 1.4.2b28.It happens on all the PCs (3) where we tried it. The regular .log containsnothing relevant.Here is the crash log:An unexpected exception has been detected in native code outside the VM.Unexpected Signal : EXCEPTIONACCESSVIOLATION (0xc0000005) SR: When we switch from jdk 1.4.1 to 1.4.2, Eclipse crashes at startup.To make it at least start, I tried with a blank workspace but Eclipses keepscrashing as soon as I try to open a perspective, a project or the configurationdetails, anything heavier than opening a menu.Eclipse 2.1.1 (Build id: 200306271545), Win2000 SP3, Sun JDK 1.4.2b28.It happens on all the PCs (3) where we tried it.
